log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: Failed to fetch from repository.
log_cookbook.solution: Check network access and repository URL. Ensure SSH keys or credentials are valid.

log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: Authentication failed during Git clone.
log_cookbook.solution: Verify Git credentials or SSH key and ensure access permissions are granted.
restart server tomcat.

log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: YAML file has syntax errors.
log_cookbook.solution: Validate YAML file using an online linter or CI/CD platform validator.
Check the script output for the root cause. Add logging to understand script behavior.
Optimize jobs or increase the timeout setting in pipeline configuration.
Ensure all required environment variables are set in the pipeline configuration.
Check package.json or requirements.txt for errors and try a clean install.
Review test logs and fix broken test cases. Ensure test environment is correctly set.

log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: Deployment failed due to missing credentials.
log_cookbook.solution: Check secrets management system and confirm credentials are injected into the job.
Ensure the deployment token or service account has the required permissions.
Optimize job memory usage or increase memory allocation in pipeline settings.
Check artifact storage configuration and network accessibility.
Ensure the branch exists in the repository and the pipeline triggers on the correct branch.
Verify Docker credentials and ensure the login command is correct in the script.
Ensure the target server has a valid certificate or configure CI to trust the certificate.

log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: Cannot connect to Kubernetes cluster.
log_cookbook.solution: Check kubeconfig and credentials used in the CI/CD pipeline. Ensure cluster is reachable.
Specify the correct Node.js version in the pipeline configuration or use version managers.
Ensure the image name and tag are correct and the image is available in the registry.

log_cookbook.error_message: ERROR: Job failed due to concurrency limit.
log_cookbook.solution: Adjust pipeline concurrency settings or wait for running jobs to finish.
